DOC.brief_summary: This initial pilot study determine whether people use research version iPhone Stop Smoking app . The investigator primary measure consist rate recruitment ( , number people instal app ) , use app , completion follow-up survey regard self-reported smoking status . The investigator secondary measure obtain quit rate number cigarette smoke use app . To enter study , participant must download app iTunes : http : //itunes.apple.com/us/app/san-francisco-stop-smoking/id522832206 ? mt=8
DOC.brief_title: San Francisco Stop Smoking App - Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator research team develop smoke cessation self-help tool administer printed brochure Internet stop smoking site . These self-help tool demonstrate quit rate similar obtain nicotine patch . The investigator want see mobile device apps might also help people quit . This investigator first pilot study research version investigator stop smoke app iPhone . The investigator want get estimate many people download app per month , many actually use app , many provide follow-up information whether quit , , many cigarette smoke . The investigator use information plan randomize controlled trial determine efficacy app stop smoking .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Must download iPhone app iTunes : http : //itunes.apple.com/us/app/sanfranciscostopsmoking/id522832206 ? mt=8 le 18 year age
